mapper.insert: INSERT INTO analysis_llm_daily ( analysis_date, peak_hours_analysis, user_sentiment_analysis, topic_interest_analysis, ai_suggestion_analysis, score_peak_hours, score_sentiment, score_topic_interest, score_suggestions, score_weighted_average, scoring_reasoning, llm_analysis_raw_response, llm_scoring_raw_response, status, error_message, processing_started_at, processing_ended_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{analysisDate}, #{peakHoursAnalysis}, #{userSentimentAnalysis}, #{topicInterestAnalysis}, #{aiSuggestionAnalysis}, #{scorePeakHours}, #{scoreSentiment}, #{scoreTopicInterest}, #{scoreSuggestions}, #{scoreWeightedAverage}, #{scoringReasoning}, #{llmAnalysisRawResponse}, #{llmScoringRawResponse}, #{status}, #{errorMessage}, #{processingStartedAt}, #{processingEndedAt}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM analysis_llm_daily WHERE analysis_date = #{analysisDate} AND status IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED') ORDER BY analysis_id DESC LIMIT 1
